gameRecap.title: Game Recap: 76ers 124, Pistons 92
gameRecap.excerpt: The 76ers defeated the Pistons, 124-92. Joel Embiid recorded 35 points, 13 rebounds, and four blocks for the 76ers, with Tyrese Maxey adding 19 points and four assists in the victory. James Wiseman tallied 20 points and 13 rebounds for the Pistons in the losing effort. The 76ers improve to 17-7 in the regular season, while the Pistons fall to 2-23.
